column4: Hello. I have a problem with the nvidia drivers. I have installed the new, old and legacy drivers. But my PC doesent work realy good. I want my screen resolutin to be 1280x1024, but it still 800x600.
you need a module and serverflags section
and busID and Screen options in the device section
Is not the problem that... Read this:
yes, I saw that. you need to manually put the info in the xorg.conf
the monitors refresh rates and stuff will be on the LG site.
But LG website sux, i can't find anything...
use mine as a template:   http://paste.ubuntu.com/18309/     but keep in mind I have a 6800, 22"monitor, svideo tv, mouse, kb, trackball and a drawing tablet
